## Highlighted Projects üîß

### 1) Assistive Smart One-Leg Exoskeleton (Final Year Project) ‚Äî Apr 2024 ‚Äì Dec 2025
- **Problem:** Objective, adaptive rehabilitation assistance for Transverse Myelitis patients.
- **Solution:** One-leg exoskeleton with kinematic-sensor MRC grading and closed-loop motor assistance using 3 IMUs (MPU6050).
- **Contributions:** Mechanical design, control algorithm, kinematic sensor integration, adaptive assistance logic.
- **Tech:** Arduino/C++, IMUs (MPU6050), SolidWorks, closed-loop motor control.
- **Outcome:** Real-time muscle grade assessment and automatic assistance level adjustment.
- **Suggested repo:** `exoskeleton-assistive-system`

---

### 2) Automated Fabric Defect Detection System ‚Äî Oct 2024 ‚Äì May 2025
- **Problem:** Manual QC for fabric defects is slow and inconsistent.
- **Solution:** Computer-vision inspection system plus mechanical sorting to automatically remove defects.
- **Contributions:** Image processing pipeline, defect classification, actuator control integration.
- **Tech:** Python, OpenCV, Raspberry Pi / microcontroller.
- **Outcome:** Prototype capable of real-time detection and mechanical sorting.
- **Suggested repo:** `fabric-defect-detection`

---

### 3) ML-Based Rainfall Detection System ‚Äî Jan 2025 ‚Äì May 2025
- **Problem:** Improve short-term rainfall forecasting for local conditions.
- **Solution:** ML model trained with feature engineering and preprocessing for robust forecasts.
- **Contributions:** Data cleaning, feature engineering, model selection and tuning.
- **Tech:** Python, scikit-learn / PyTorch, pandas.
- **Outcome:** High-accuracy model ready for deployment pipeline.
- **Suggested repo:** `rainfall-forecast-ml`
